changeSet.createView: SELECT base_table.id, s.name AS service, sc.name AS status_code, base_table.sequence_number, ns.name AS next_sibling, nss.name AS next_sibling_status, base_table.notes, up.name AS updated_by, w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, base_table.version FROM sibling_sequencing_authorization base_table JOIN existential s ON base_table.service = s.id JOIN existential sc ON base_table.status_code = sc.id LEFT JOIN existential ns ON base_table.next_sibling = ns.id LEFT JOIN existential nss ON base_table.next_sibling_status = nss.id JOIN existential up ON base_table.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN workspace_authorization wa ON base_table.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN existential w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
